info.description:
This contains all API for 3M Platform

## Chat API Overview

The Chat API provides comprehensive messaging functionality for the platform, including direct messaging, message management, and chat room operations. All endpoints require authentication and integrate with RocketChat for real-time messaging.

### Key Features

- **AI Moderation**: All messages are analyzed for inappropriate content with a strike system
- **File Attachments**: Support for images, documents, videos, and audio files
- **Real-time Events**: WebSocket events for message updates and chat room changes
- **Rate Limiting**: 60 requests/minute for most endpoints, 30/minute for sending messages
- **Message Management**: Edit (within 6 minutes), delete, and search capabilities
- **Chat Organization**: Archive, delete, and mute notification options

### Authentication

All chat endpoints require authentication using Laravel Sanctum. Include the Bearer token in the Authorization header:

```
Authorization: Bearer {your_token}
```

### Rate Limiting

- 60 requests per minute per user for most endpoints
- 30 requests per minute for message sending
- 100 requests per hour for search operations

### File Attachments

- **Supported Formats**: Images, documents, videos, audio files
- **File Size Limit**: Varies by file type
- **Storage**: Files are stored securely and linked to messages
- **Metadata**: File information is tracked including original filename and size

### Real-time Events

The chat system uses WebSocket events for real-time updates:

- **Message Sent**: `MessageSent` event when a new message is sent
- **Chat Room Updated**: `ChatRoomUpdated` event when chat room status changes
- **Read Status**: Real-time updates when messages are read

## Support Tickets API Overview

The Support Tickets API provides comprehensive ticket management functionality, supporting both authenticated users and guest access. The system includes spam protection, file validation, and comprehensive ticket lifecycle management.

### Key Features

- **Dual Authentication**: Works with Bearer tokens or X-Guest-Email headers
- **File Attachments**: Support for PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG files (max 15MB each)
- **Spam Protection**: Built-in spam detection and rate limiting
- **Ticket Lifecycle**: Complete management from creation to resolution
- **Message Threading**: Support for threaded conversations with file attachments
- **Status Management**: Comprehensive status tracking and filtering
- **Visual Styling**: Built-in CSS classes and color schemes for categories and importance levels
- **User Information**: Complete user profile data when available

### Authentication

All support ticket endpoints use optional authentication middleware, working with:

- **Bearer Token**: `Authorization: Bearer {your_token}`
- **Guest Access**: `X-Guest-Email: guest@example.com`

### Rate Limiting

- **Individual IP**: 10 requests per day
- **IP Network**: 20 requests per day

### File Attachments

- **Supported Formats**: PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG
- **File Size Limit**: 15MB per file
- **Validation**: File extension and content signature validation
- **Storage**: Secure file storage with download URLs

### Response Features

- **Ticket Numbers**: Auto-generated in format `{PREFIX}-{6-digit-number}` (e.g., GEN-123456, FINT-789012)
- **Styling Information**: CSS classes and color codes for categories and importance levels
- **User Details**: Profile information including names, username, and profile picture
- **Message Counts**: Total message count and latest message preview
- **Formatted Dates**: Human-readable local timezone dates
info.title: 3M Api

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Endpoints related to user authentication, including login, logout, token management, and API key validation. These routes are used to verify user credentials and establish secure access to the API.

tags.name: Profile
tags.description: Endpoints for viewing, updating, and managing the authenticated user's profile information, such as personal details, preferences, photos, and account settings.

tags.name: Currencies
tags.description: Get all the available currencies data

tags.name: Chat
tags.description: The Chat API provides comprehensive messaging functionality for the platform, including direct messaging, message management, and chat room operations. All endpoints require authentication and integrate with RocketChat for real-time messaging. Features include AI-powered content moderation, file attachments, real-time events, and rate limiting.

tags.name: Reports & Interactions
tags.description: Endpoints for reporting users, blocking interactions, and requesting zoom calls

tags.name: Contracts
tags.description: Endpoints for managing contracts between sponsors and seekers, including contract creation, approval, modification, and lifecycle management.

tags.name: People
tags.description: Endpoints for viewing public user profiles and their information. These endpoints allow authenticated users to view other users' profiles using their public username.

tags.name: Support Tickets
tags.description: Endpoints for managing support tickets, including creating, viewing, updating tickets, retrieving categories, statuses, and notification options, and managing ticket messages with file attachments. Supports both authenticated users and guest access with pagination. File attachments support PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG (max 15MB each). Rate limited: 10 requests per day per IP, 20 requests per day per IP network. All endpoints use optional authentication middleware, working with Bearer tokens or X-Guest-Email headers. Includes spam protection, file validation, and comprehensive ticket lifecycle management.

tags.name: Notifications
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user notifications, including listing, filtering, marking as read, updating importance, and managing user preferences. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

tags.name: Affiliate
tags.description: Endpoints for managing affiliate links, statistics, and earnings. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication using Laravel Sanctum.

tags.name: Wallet
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user wallet and balance information, including retrieving current balance, deposits, withdrawals, and purchase power. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Endpoints for searching user profiles with advanced filtering options including location, budget, languages, and custom parameters. Supports pagination, sorting, and role-based filtering. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

post.description: Search for user profiles with advanced filtering options. Supports location-based search, budget filtering, language matching, and custom parameter filtering. Results are automatically filtered based on user role and mutual interest settings.

is_worldwide.description: If true, search worldwide. If false, use specific locations or user's location

places.description: Array of location objects for specific location search

max.description: Maximum monthly budget (required for sponsor users)

currency.description: Currency code (e.g., 'USD', 'AED'). Defaults to system default currency

selected.description: Array of language names to search for

custom_parameters.description: Array of custom parameter objects for advanced filtering

value_range.description: Range object with min/max values for range-based searches

Comprehensive Search Example.summary: Search for profiles in Dubai with specific criteria
Comprehensive Search Example.description: Search for profiles within 10km of Dubai with budget between $1,000-$10,000, who speak English or Arabic, with bachelor's education and age 25-35

Success Response.description: Search results with user profiles and pagination metadata

message.example: User location not found. Please update your location in your profile.

Error Response.summary: Error when user location is not found
Error Response.description: Error response when the user's location is not available for search

value.message: User location not found. Please update your location in your profile.

post.description: Validate and check custom parameter values for search functionality. This endpoint helps verify if custom parameter values are valid before using them in search queries.

value.description: The value to validate for the custom parameter

category.description: The category of the custom parameter to validate

Profession Example.description: Validate a profession value for search

Education Example.description: Validate an education level value for search

valid.description: Whether the parameter value is valid

suggestions.description: Suggested values if the provided value is not exact

Valid Parameter.description: Response when the parameter value is valid

value.message: Parameter value is valid

Invalid Parameter.description: Response when the parameter value is invalid but suggestions are provided

get.description: Checks if the authenticated user has any active contracts.
Retrieves all contracts for the authenticated user (both as sponsor and seeker). Supports pagination and search functionality.

post.description: Creates a new contract offer to a partner. The user cannot offer contract to themselves, cannot have active contracts while offering new ones, and the partner cannot have active contracts. Cannot have pending contracts with the same partner. Partner must exist and have the opposite role (sponsor/seeker).

action.description: Request to upgrade contract to preliminary

value.sub_messages: It will end by 10:00 am of 18 Jan 2024. If restarted, the skipped time will be added to the billing. If not, you will receive the last transfer until the current moment at the next billing date following the 3-day cool-off period.
